mapper.select: select category, title, input_date, notice_num from notice where blind_flag='N' order by input_date desc
select category, title, input_date, notice_num from notice where blind_flag = 'N' and category = #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by input_date desc

select category, title, input_date, notice_num from notice where blind_flag = 'N'
and title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and (title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
order by input_date desc
